title: True Short Stories in Slow Vietnamese | Comprehensible Story #1 for Vietnamese listening practice
content: That time (it) was 1 o'clock morning. A man was driving back home. The road was very dark. Suddenly, he saw a little girl. The girl was wandering alone. The driver stepped out of the car. He went towards the little girl's place. The girl was only around 2 years old, approximately his child's age. He didn’t know where she lived. He felt very worried. He had to go to find her parents. But he needed help! The surrounding was very quiet. Everyone already went to sleep. He tried to knock on the door of each house. He did so for more than 3 minutes. Finally, a man opened the door. He recognized the little girl. The man led the driver to the little girl’s house. Her house was near there. Her mom was very happy to have found the child. Her dad went to work far away. Her mom felt tired after working and overslept. That night it was very hot. The little girl woke up and went outside alone. Luckily the girl was able to meet the driver. Her family was very grateful. He was a kind-hearted driver.

The surrounding was very quiet.

He tried to knock on the door of each house.

Finally, a man opened the door.
He recognized the little girl.
The man led the driver to the little girl’s house.
Her house was near there.
Her mom was very happy to have found the child.
Her dad went to work far away.
Her mom felt tired after working and overslept.
That night it was very hot.
The little girl woke up and went outside alone.
Luckily the girl was able to meet the driver.
Her family was very grateful.
He was a kind-hearted driver.
